TI_DOC.P: EIB - Preliminary studies & project design for Port Victoria Seychelles (LU-Luxembourg)

TXT_MARK.P: Bridging Facility of 11th European Development Fund under ACP-EC Partnership Agreement

The general objective of the proposed technical assistance is to update the preliminary studies and provide a number of additional surveys and project design for the rehabilitation and extension of the Port of Victoria in Seychelles, which the Bank is co-financing with the AFD and the EC.

The proposed technical assistance is covering the remaining preliminary works and project design prior to the commencement of the works. This TA is critical for the proper and careful preparation and planning of the project, notably in view of the dredging works and the environmental risks associated, and in view of the obligation to maintain the port activities during construction (the Port of Victoria is the only multipurpose port of Seychelles).

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Intended timing of publication of the contract notice

TXT_MARK.P: ACP-EU Partnership Agreement signed in Cotonou on 23.6.2000 as amended in Luxembourg on 25.6.2005 and in Ouagadougou on 22.6.2010; Council Regulation (EU) 2015/323 of 2.3.2015 on the financial regulation applicable to the 11th European Development Fund.
